data.title: EDIC Saturn 20" High Speed Floor Burnisher 2000 RPM
data.meta_description: High-speed burnishers designed for a super high-gloss finish on hard floors. 20" head, up to 2000 RPM motors, and durable powder-coated brush covers.
data.text:
This tool is constructed with strong metal materials which includes a stainless-steel brush cover, that make this machine not only durable but also highly reliable. Each unit is equipped with flex-lock pad driver, also available in fold down and conventional models.

Standard Features

1500 rpm

20" pad diameter

1.5hp motor

multi-V belt gear box

75' power cord

heavy-duty steel strain reduction with spring guard

stainless-steel brush cover

smooth, anti fatigue handle grips

chrome plated steel handle

5" wheels

non marking PVC bumper

double trigger secure switch

96 lbs weight

This model includes:
